amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act under the heading Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability and Efficiency may be used by the Department of Energy for wind energy programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill by the Department of Energy for wind energy programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Whitfield amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 94 - 329 (Roll no. 339).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Whitfield amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 94 - 329 (Roll no. 339).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Whitfield.
